item.title: My Nth first blog post
item.description: This is the Nth first blog post for my (new) blog. My requirements for blogging are simple, I just care about writing and I don’t really want to waste a lot of time typing commands to create the blog, to format it, or publish it…or any of that. In the past I have tried several solutions such as: Medium – I liked it because it pretty much meet my requirements, I was just concern about writing.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am not very consistent at writing but sometimes you’ll find some content here. You can also find me on Medium.
